author: Silver-Fang
body:
https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/powershell/module/threadjob
This module is invisible at https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/powershell/module
Newcomers who don't know its existence won't have a chance to encounter it.

comments.author: mklement0
comments.body:
Good point, but the better place to report this is at https://github.com/MicrosoftDocs/PowerShell-Docs/issues Improvements to the new-issue page to make it clearer that documentation issues shouldn't actually be reported _here_ are [underway](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/pull/11153).
GitHub
MicrosoftDocs/PowerShell-Docs
The official PowerShell documentation sources. Contribute to MicrosoftDocs/PowerShell-Docs development by creating an account on GitHub.

comments.author: sdwheeler
comments.body: This was fixed a long time ago.

title: Why doesn't ThreadJob Module appear in the module explorer?
